name: RHUMC
tagline: Mathematics Conference Scheduling Software for Rose-Hulman
body:
###Undergraduate Math Conference Scheduling Software
===
This GitHub page for the Rose-Hulman Undergraduate Math Conference Scheduling Software (RHUMC). It is written in Python using the Django web framework and designed to serve as free and lightweight schedule management software for academic conferences and the likes. It was specifically designed for [Rose-Hulman](http://www.rose-hulman.edu)'s [Undergraduate Math Conference](http://www.rose-hulman.edu/class/ma/web/mathconf/), but it should suitable for any sort of conference gathering.

Features
---
The main features include:
* Easy student/faculty registration via web forms
* Ability to create additional pages (for information, etc.)
* Full administrative panel
  * Attendee management system
  * Conference and talk management system
  * Attendee auto-emailer
  * LaTeX program generator
  * LaTeX name badge generator
  * Attendee batch updater (for fixing form typos, etc.)
* Fully editable HTML templates

Releases
---
####Stable
[Version 1.0.1](https://github.com/crawfonw/RHUMC/releases/tag/v.1.0.1) (Jan. 10, 2014)

####Experimental
None yet! See what's in the [pipeline](https://github.com/crawfonw/RHUMC/branches).
